items.badge_description: Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 30 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 7!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 7)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 8!
Thanks for choosing to drink delicious beers at Tap & Mallet. Continue to check in beers to level up. Cheers!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 30 distinct venues!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 45 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 10!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 65 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 14.
With so much to be grateful for in the world of beer, it's time to crack open your favorite and give thanks. Cheers and happy Thanksgiving!

items.checkin_comment: A little sweet, but still good

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 10 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 35 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 8!

It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 5 different beers with the style of Fruit Beer or Sour - Fruited. Try 5 more for Level 2.

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 30 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 7!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 35 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 8!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 40 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 9!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 25 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 6!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 60 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 13.
